title: [Grawood Farmstead, Meadow]
description: Sections of split-rail fence create an enclosure with openings that lead to the very heart of the town.  Set back from the fences is a square wooden table draped with a checkered cloth.  Atop the table, a shallow, cushion-lined tray sits beside a small paper sign, and behind the table is a short, unoccupied stool.

Sections of split-rail fence create an enclosure with openings that lead to the very heart of the town.  Set back from the fences is a square wooden table draped with a checkered cloth.  Atop the table, a shallow, cushion-lined tray sits, and behind the table is a short stool occupied by a young woman.
paths: Obvious paths: northeast, southeast, southwest, northwest
room.location: Grawood Farmstead outside of River's Rest
